meanings.sent1: The player got a ribbie with a solid hit.

meanings.definition: To hit a home run in baseball.
meanings.sent1: He ribbies the ball out of the park!
meanings.sent2: She ribbied in the final inning to win the game.
meanings.sent3: The batter ribbies with style and grace.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a ribeye steak.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant serves a delicious ribbie for dinner.
meanings.sent2: I prefer my ribbie cooked medium rare.
meanings.sent3: He ordered a juicy ribbie for his birthday celebration.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sizzling ribbie filled the room.
meanings.sent5: Grilling a ribbie on a summer evening is a treat.
